1.text: Pour a dollop of thick shampoo into a little dish.

2.text: Add a small amount of toothpaste.
2.vid: /4/4d/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Stir the two together with a toothpick.

4.text: Add more shampoo or toothpaste, if needed, and continue stirring.
4.vid: /6/68/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Freeze the slime for 10 to 60 minutes.

6.text: Knead the slime until it softens up again.
6.vid: /f/f3/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.vid: /c/c7/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Squeeze some 2-in-1 shampoo into a dish.
8.vid: /8/8d/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Stir everything together with a toothpick.
10.vid: /4/4b/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.vid: /9/9c/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.text: Squeeze out some shampoo into a little dish.

14.vid: /f/ff/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Mix the slime until it's combined.
15.vid: /0/03/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4

16.text: Add a pinch of salt and stir again.
16.vid: /4/49/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 16 Version 2.360p.mp4

17.text: Adjust the consistency as you continue to stir.

18.vid: /9/96/Make Slime with Just Shampoo and Toothpaste Step 18 Version 2.360p.mp4
